Darkfate/Dragonfly/Black Fortress


Darkfate arrived to BlackFortress when Alarms started to ring, 
Dragonfly shouted "By the pit What's going here!!!!???"


Darkfate roared "I just arrived here... and Troubles start..." he 
opned his comm link to COmm center "What's going on????"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Neody/Killfest/Incarcinator/Scyther/Crater::
> 
> Neody catches up with the other Destrons in time to enter the base 
> with them. He looks around, then watching Ramjet begin to talk to 
> DrillBit. His senses indicated that Crater was somewhere near.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Killfest, Incarcinator, and Scyther enter when Darkmouse opens the 
> entrance. Incarcinator and Scyther walk off to the CRs, Killfest 
> walking to DrillBit to see what was going on.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Crater raises an eyebrow as he hears Darkmouse's announcement. 
These 
> bots didn't look very good at all. No wonder the Great Ones wanted 
> them exterminated.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., logomorph@h... wrote:
> > DarkMouse::
> > 
> > "No trouble BossBot." She opened the entrance for Killfest and 
the 
> > others to enter. Then sat back in her chair, still chuckling to 
> > herself.
